name: Dream Machine
description: This algorithm is an implementation of the original Dream Machine algorithm on the disting EX. It is designed to generate drones, allowing the user to explore non-traditional harmonies based on prime ratios. Inspired by composer La Monte Young's theories, it generates five sounds—a fundamental and four harmonics—using wavetable synthesis (or pure sine/triangle/square waves for the fundamental). Each tone has an attack/release envelope controlled by its own gate parameter. By default, little is mapped to CV inputs, but users can map them as FM inputs or control gates.
use_cases: Exploring non-traditional harmonies using prime ratios
Generating ambient drones with custom tunings
Frequency modulation (FM) synthesis via CV inputs
Environmental sound tuning to resonant frequencies
gui_description: The display shows the current wavetable waveform on the right side of the screen. The rest of the screen displays frequency, ratio, and gate level for all five tones (fundamental + four harmonics) from left to right.

specifications.name: Synthesis Method
specifications.value: Wavetable synthesis (with optional pure sine/triangle/square waves for the fundamental)
